segments.text: Are you still hungry , Ryan ? How about some more squid balls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Squid balls ? How about some more fruit !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You really like fruit , huh ? You've already had 3 plates !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it's funny . I usually don't ever eat fruit ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , whatever suits your fancy . I'll press the service button again .
segments.speaker: S1
